name: Kaori After Story
description: Kaori After Story is a slice-of-life, relationship-centric comedy sequel to ACE Academy; fully voiced and extensively interactive!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics, NVIDIA 600 Series, AMD 7000 Series Storage: 1000 MB available space
